com.mathgame.cards

Class NumberCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLabel
            • com.mathgame.cards.NumberCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class NumberCard
extends javax.swing.JLabel
    The NumberCard class represents the cards of numbers that are used during Epsilon games
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
